short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the latest projects from HCL Engineering.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay updated with the most recent projects from HCL Engineering with just one click. This Chrome extension provides you instant access to the latest featured projects, complete with images, titles, and a short description for each.

Whether you're an industry professional, potential client, or just interested in the innovative work HCL Engineering delivers, this extension offers a convenient way to stay informed without navigating away from your current page.

Features:

Latest Projects Feed: Displays the latest three projects from HCL Engineering's website.
Project Details: View project titles, featured images, and excerpts directly within the extension.
Quick Access: Links to the full project pages for more in-depth details.
Auto-Updates: Automatically updates the feed to show the most current projects.

How It Works:
Once installed, click on the extension's icon in your Chrome toolbar to open a popup window displaying the latest three engineering projects. Each project entry includes a clickable image and title that will take you to the detailed project page on HCL Engineering's website.

Keep the feed refreshed for the latest developments, all without leaving your current tab!
